opposite_reasoning: BacterialAgent is the strongest opposite for FungalAgent because: (1) Both are BiologicalAgent subtypes representing pathogenic microorganisms, making them directly comparable; (2) They are mutually exclusive taxonomic categories from different biological kingdoms; (3) High likelihood of existence in both WordNet and SUMO ontologies; (4) Provides clean opposition useful for Fisher-LDA without introducing excessive noise. The bacteria-fungi distinction is fundamental in biology and medicine, making this a natural and interpretable opposite.
